Doo doo doodoo. It may be fake but it's still freaky as Hell. You can't 
tell me that you never felt like you were being followed and saw nothing 
when you turned around. It may be real, something big is going on, 
spiritual forces are stronger. It is really noticeable and if you can't see 
it, feel it, or if you do and brush it off as an over active imagination, 
then you are blind, dumb, and extremely small minded. I feel sorry for you, 
especially if your sole purpose in life is to watch YouTube videos made to 
inform and/or frighten you and call them all "fake". Spend a night in our 
master bedroom and see if you sing the same tune.... There is a reason no 
one sleeps in there.﻿
